param.name: isWhite
param.desc: white if true, red if false

param.name: promptTxt
param.desc: used if prompting to open the large tutorial

param.name: image
param.desc: neuromod, transcribe, weaponkit, psychoscope, fabricationplan, keycard, keycode, password

param.name: ReticleYOffset
param.desc: 0-1 percent from top of the screen

param.name: ReticleXOffset
param.desc: 0-1 percent from left of the screen

param.name: ReticleX
param.desc: 0-1 percent from left of the screen

param.name: ReticleY
param.desc: 0-1 percent from top of the screen

param.name: reticleDisplay
param.desc: none, default, crosshair, shotgun, grenade, goo

param.name: isAware
param.desc: true if in combat, false if else

param.name: yOffset
param.desc: 0-1 percent from top of the screen

param.name: xOffset
param.desc: 0-1 percent from left of the screen

param.name: Text
param.desc: Text to display in center of screen

param.name: Text
param.desc: Text to display in center of screen

param.name: Text
param.desc: Text to display when unlocking power
